REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2314 reute a f BC-KLEINWORT-BENSON-<KBA 03-20 0054

TEXT.TITLE: KLEINWORT BENSON <KBA> UNIT SETS FIRST DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY:
Kleinwort Benson International Investment Ltd's subsidiary, Kleinwort Benson Australian Income Fund, a closed end management investment company, declared its first quarterly dividend of 36.5 cts payable April 16 to shareholders of record April 1.
Reuter
